refnamediv.refpurpose: Calculates main and interaction effects using Yates' algorithm.

listitem.para: calculated response from a two-level complete factorial design
vector of average response, main effects and interaction effects
identification vector of main and interaction effects

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Calculates main and interaction effects using Yates' algorithm.

doe_yates applies the Yates' algorithm to the responses Y to obtain average response, main effects and interaction effects. Y is assumed to be arranged in what is called standard order. (The order of the actual running should, of course, be random).
EF(1,:) is the average response and EF(2:$,:) contain the main effects and interaction effects corresponding to the vector ID.

doe_yates may also be used in analyzing data from any 2^(K-P) fractional factorial design. The algorithm is applied in the usual way to any ambedded complete factorial in K-P factors, i.e., the responses must be rearranged so that K-P factors is a complete factorial in standard order. Then associate the calculated effects with their appropriate aliases using ALIAS.

refsection.title: Examples
Bibliography
refsection.para: Box, G.E.P, Hunter, W.G. and Hunter, J.S. (1978) Statistics for experimenters, John Wiley & Sons, pp 342
